website_summaries.verdict: A top-of-the-line lock from a top manufacturer. Rugged quality and reliable performance w/impressive features for added security. The best choice.
pros: Stellar feature set: shackle dust shield, easy-to-see numbers w/cover, tamper-proof design, and industrial-grade strength
cons: It's also large and heavy, and it may be too much for some needs

customer_reviews.title: Even the replacement jammed in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: The combination is correct. The lock is free from obstrucions. The lock will not close without very segnifient force. I have tried resetting the passcode, but that doesn't help. It started off great. I liked that it was shrouded to prevent cutting. However, the internal construction is poorly designed. You can't cut the lock, but you can't lock it either. Great paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: JPH

customer_reviews.title: I bought this lock at Lowes and and here looking ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lock at Lowes and and here looking again because it has to be replaced after only 1 month. The combo numbers dont spin very well, something not at all. Right now it is stuck on the correct combo so I cannot lock it. Some lock.
customer_reviews.author: sHoCkErRoCkEt

customer_reviews.title: Hackable Lock
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put on my dumpsters at my business to keep people from digging everything out but they were still getting in and I couldn't figure out how. One of my tenants could a person at night in the dumpster and asked how they got in. He said I got on YouTube and found a video on how to hack it! I looked on youtube and sure enough, you can get in without having the code. Worthless Lock!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Long

customer_reviews.title: Secure, but fussy?
customer_reviews.text: I feel much more secure with this on my trailer. The instructions to set it are not very intuitive, so don't loose them. I did struggle to get it open twice, and after getting frustrated told my husband to do it. Don't think it was a "needs strength to pull open" issue. It just wasn't clicking open when i expected it too and took some jiggling. I won't put it on something I open frequently unless i figure out what I'm doing wrong. But would buy again for the peace of mind
customer_reviews.author: L8rGatorTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Mechanism sticks
customer_reviews.text: Used three or four times over several months. The last time I tried to open it, the mechanism was stuck shut. Tried wd40, tapping with small hammer, reentering the code, hitting with a bigger hammer. Nothing worked. Had to cut through the shackle with a grinder/ cutoff wheel. I have several of Masters locks similar to this one but they aren't the higher security type like this. They have worked perfectly well outdoors for years. This model is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serious lock.
customer_reviews.text: Feels very solid and the dials certainly feel precise and not loose like other combo locks. There is a feature where the dials only turn to nine or zero then you have to g ok back the other direction, supposed to be so you can do it in the dark. I don't like it at all. The numbers aren't big and inevitably when I pass a number in low light conditions I have to backtrack. Smallest of problems I know but it's annoying. Oh and somewhere in the description it says its good with gloves. No. No, it's not.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Important to know where to line up the numbers
customer_reviews.text: You don't know if you're going to love or hate this thing until you are sitting in your warm truck while your kid is out there struggling to figure out how to open it in the dark 0 degree windy night. Do yourself (and your kid) a favor and take a sharpie to the dimple indicating where the numbers line up while you can see it. The rubber cover and grommet that look so smart and protecty come right off at the worst time, require some dexterity (you won't have holding this ice brick in the cold) to get them back on.
customer_reviews.author: davidjmcclelland

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping great but when I got the lock it had some corrosion like stuff on the front as it was probably not stored well also the shackle rocks back and forth a lot like a loose teeth overall it looks like a good lock but the seller has not yet responded
customer_reviews.author: Sodial

customer_reviews.title: 2 months later.... beware
customer_reviews.text: Loved this at first and now two months later it breaks and is stuck. Beware buying this lock. Very disappointed and welcome a refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: instograeme

customer_reviews.title: Sand destroyed this lock in less than 2 hours of usage
customer_reviews.text: This lasted literally one day at the beach and sand gunked it up. I know that sand is rough on all things.. but WOW... it literally locked up and can no longer be opened. "Shackle seal and dial dust cover protect internal components and dials for trouble free operation "... YEAH RIGHT! I recommend to lock this upside down if possible so sand doesn't easily enter the components
customer_reviews.author: seeker407

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty. Would be great for indoor use. I used for locking gates on near-oceanfront property. After 2 years, they are each a loose rusty mess and full of sand? which makes them nearly impossible to use. I'll be replacing them with something cheaper. Even if the new ones last a year, it will be more economical to replace.
customer_reviews.author: JonBoy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a month
customer_reviews.text: Never changed the pass code, one day it would not close to lock my Vespa. I took it in the house, set my code and it locked. However, it then wouldn't re-open. Thank God I didn't have my scooter locked! I have always been a Master Lock fan, however I sure was disappointed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Barber

customer_reviews.title: Total Junk
customer_reviews.text: Total junk buyer beware do not buy this lock un less you want headaches. Waste of time and money master lock you really let me down on this lock. The lock freezes up will not lock you cannot turn dial and there’s YouTube videos on how to easily get the codes for this lock so anybody can break into it
customer_reviews.author: A Carson

customer_reviews.title: Good lock...but
customer_reviews.text: Good lock...but when it's unlocked you can't turn any of the numbers. That means either re-lock it or leave the combination for all to see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: C’mon Master lock...
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great lock if it opened with the spring assist. I purchased this item (2) as the dimensions were perfect to use in my work knnack box, the only problem was that it locks but you can’t get it to open unless you can grab it and pull on it. This is a near impossible feat in the recessed cavity of the knnack box. The recomended lock (not this one) does have spring assist but is small enough to get stuck at an angle and you’ll end up having to take a screwdriver to it to unjam it from the recessed lock cavity This got two stars only because it is a master lock
customer_reviews.author: A Ottosen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these and we set all the combinations the same for out buildings on out property. I thought they would be difficult to cut off. The loop that goes through the hasp is protected by the collar. The loop is thick, too. Four number combinations are harder to crack, too.
customer_reviews.author: Xander and Patrick's Nana

customer_reviews.title: Annoying to use, Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: Annoying at best. Two ✌️ aspects that are truly aggravating about this lock: 1. It is downright difficult to close when using on a latch because it only locks from one position, the locking bar must swing from left to right, clockwise since the protecting front corners prohibit counterclockwise. Sounds ok in words, but $/!@!? effin annoying in use. 2. The cover to the Numbers will not stay on, falls out way to easily.
customer_reviews.author: anj m.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Secure
customer_reviews.text: I use this lock on my tool shed. Works great and is very tough. Setting up my own combination was simple. It would be close to impossible to break-in with bolt cutters. Probably the most secure lock I've ever owned. I would definitely recommend this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Green

customer_reviews.title: Very tough, intimidating combo lock
customer_reviews.text: My two locks I bought function very well, smooth Combo keys, easy to set up, very strong with enough steel enclosure surrounding the shaft and faceplate to deter thieves or curious folk from messing with it and move on. I use it on my wood sheds and tack room with strong Hasps and feel good about the deterent.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dubbs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Being concerned with equipment theft as I am, these locks sure make things a lot more difficult for thieves. Bolt cutters for a quick break have met their match. They are also holding up a bit better in the weather than other locks. Possibly because of the design not allowing as much water in
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D.

customer_reviews.title: Beefy But Problematic
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult to get to lock/unlock and oftentimes the numbers refuse to rotate unless you smack the lock pretty hard. I'm going to hit it with some WD40 and see if that helps. I may look to use a different lock if this problem persists after lubrication. Really, the lock is only like a month old so I shouldn't be having this problem. Other than that, it's a heavy lock and it looks intimidating. I believe these qualities are a deterrent when someone is looking to smash open or cut a lock.
customer_reviews.author: John E Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, like everyone says, the rubber cover on the bottom is useless. I bought 3 of these at once for outdoor use on a gates that are opened & closed once a day. All 3 started rusting almost immediately despite regular doses of WD40. One eventually locked up closed and had to be cut off with a grinding wheel. The 2nd one took about a year to finally quit working but at least it broke in the open position. 3rd one is barely hanging on. The rollers are hard to turn and become loose with a few months. For the money, I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Beef Malone

customer_reviews.title: The lock is really really sturdy for sure
customer_reviews.text: The lock is really really sturdy for sure. It is weird that the dials will lock if it goes one way and will keep rolling if it goes another. I took 1 star off because the shroud is ridiculously high. It's high to the point where it's really hard to find a lock that fit the shroud properly. I had to use my rotary tool to shear off the first 2 notches (and sand it down) so it would fit properly. Other than that, I definitely love having a solid lock.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vayakornvichit

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I truly believe this is the best lock on the market. I bought one for each of my storage units. You can feel how heavy duty it is just from holding it.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Mews

customer_reviews.title: Great lock, but the rubber cover falls off every time.
customer_reviews.text: The rubber bottom falls of just about every time I go to use it. It’s obnoxious so I just leave it off now, which bothers me to not have the weatherization aspect. I accept that the rubber bottom is a bit petty and really not a big deal. It’s a Great lock otherwise. It gets 5 of em.
customer_reviews.author: G D

customer_reviews.title: They look cool
customer_reviews.text: As stated the dials won't turn it there is tension on the shackle. The collar is easy to cut with bolt cutters, you don't even need strength. It only takes 15 seconds to cut off, I had an employee to mistakenly reset the combination.
customer_reviews.author: CyberAdic33

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Although these locks look beefy they're prone to issues. One thing I dislike about it is that you have to have the combination lined up to close the lock. Also, the numbers can become stuck fairly easily. I ordered 2 and had to replace one right away. The rubber covers that come on it fall off immediately. They are also one of the easiest combo locks to crack the code.
customer_reviews.author: B K Wood

customer_reviews.title: Upgrading to 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: Happened to me, too. After a few weeks, lock wouldn't open. Now am really stuck. Found out that the lock had mysteriously jumped one number - i.e. for example, instead of 0000 to open, it had jumped to 1000. Once I was able to open the lock again, I could reset it. If only one number jumps, then it isn't that hard to try all combinations of one number shifts, moving plus or minus one, one number at a time. Upgraded to 3 stars, since this problem could leave others in a bind, if they don't know about this quirk. However, otherwise, it is a good lock.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wong

customer_reviews.title: Badass, works
customer_reviews.text: I have for an inside storage unit so can't speak to weather but this thing is badass, intimidating and extremely difficult to cut.
customer_reviews.author: NYCWV

customer_reviews.title: Garbage! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely garbage. It jammed and stopped working after 33 days. Amazon won't take a return. The worst lock I've ever owned. This is a replacement for my first one, which was dead on arrival
customer_reviews.author: Riley Sharbonno

customer_reviews.title: If you want a good lock for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a lock that would be harder to remove, and I think I picked the right product for that goal, but this might have still been overkill. The metal guard makes this lock too big for many lockers. If you're locking a chain on a gate—or something similar—this is probably the right lock. If you want a good lock for the gym, maybe look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Harris

customer_reviews.title: To easy to get into
customer_reviews.text: 36 inch bolt cutters go through it on the first time. The shroud is a very nice feature thought, but the lock just isn't strong enough. Doesn't even work against a common thief tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Number Dials Defected
customer_reviews.text: The Lock looks Great, BUT the "Comb. Numbers are real HARD to TURN...., Sometimes it takes up to a Minute to Turn Each ONE! This ITEM is Definetly Defected....... What to Do..What to Dooooo...
customer_reviews.author: el_Batoviejo

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 of these
customer_reviews.text: I have these on two gates to our back yard. Have had no trouble with them but I do keep them lubricated.
customer_reviews.author: doubleganger

customer_reviews.title: Masterlock 1177d
customer_reviews.text: Great lock. The fact that you do not need a tool to change the combination is a huge plus. I have been using this lock for months outdoors not far from the beach and so far it has stood up to the salty air. If you plan on using a combination lock near the ocean I would always spray the lock with a hydrophobic spray like wd40 and make sure it gets all over the tumblers and in the locking mechanism (soaking) then I would grease the shackle where it enters the lock.
customer_reviews.author: J. Goeppner

customer_reviews.title: doesn't fit a lot of things
customer_reviews.text: due to the guard, this actually didn't work for me. Went with a disc lock instead.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Brady

customer_reviews.title: Solid lock
customer_reviews.text: Lock is great. Beware that the chrome lock ring is thicker than the standard master lock. It wouldn't fit through the same lock hole that the previously cut Master lock w/out the shoulders did.
customer_reviews.author: AtlantaStephen

customer_reviews.title: Good for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: So far this lock has been good for outdoor use, it is in a spot that is unprotected from the elements, and still works great
customer_reviews.author: Rod Fugler

customer_reviews.title: strong lock but hard to program and at times needs to be reprogramed.
customer_reviews.text: strong lock but hard to program and at times needs to be reprogramed.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: THE LOCK THAT LOCKS FOREVERMORE
customer_reviews.text: LOCKS UP IN THE COLD, IT WAS ONLY 33-35F AND THE WHEELS LOCKED UP, WAS NOT WET NO RAN NO SNOW. UNLESS YOU WANT TO LOCK UP SOMETHING FOREVER LOOK ELSEWHERE
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: this lock froze shut during the winter of 2015. ...
customer_reviews.text: this lock froze shut during the winter of 2015.the combination wouldn't open at all.I had to hacksaw it off of my shed to access my snow thrower .Do NOT buy this for outside use if you intend on using it in the winter when it's cold.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK THE TANK

customer_reviews.title: Junky locks that fail to perform
customer_reviews.text: The design was exactly what I was looking for, combo lock with cut resistant design. But as I began to try to set the convo I realized that these locks were junk. The combo rollers would jam and stop spinning. The lock portion did not even work. Both locks had the same issue. Made in China junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shaft on this lock is huge. I like the lock but not sure I will keep it. great concept
customer_reviews.text: I like the secure nature of this lock. Super heavy duty and looks stout. The lock shaft is pretty big though.
customer_reviews.author: Robb

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Like the beefiness. No issue with operation. The sponge dustcover is pathetic. It falls off every other time you close it. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: David & Bonnie R.

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Lock
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because people were breaking into the tool shed at the community garden. The lock I had used previously was one you could not snip off but the last thieves broke into the lock box and took the awesome unsnippable lock so I replaced it with this lock, which was a way better solution than using a lock box. You cant snip this off with bolt cutters, you can't open it without the combo, PERIOD.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I thought this was going to be a great secure lock for a storage facility that needed access by multiple people. I was wrong, this thing lasted about 2 weeks until I put in the combination and it wouldn't open. Finally I had to pry the shackle up to open it. Now the lock wont lock again so I guess I have a 20 dollar paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: JMCK

customer_reviews.title: I have had these outdoor for 4-5 months now. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had these outdoor for 4-5 months now. They are starting to rust, and the part that covers the numbers as fallen off on two of them. They do stay lock however and you can set your own combination.
customer_reviews.author: Mountaingen

customer_reviews.title: Over-priced, cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Lock arrived in a used, previously opened condition and would not work. Number dials would not turn. Looks like poor quality. The weatherproof cover over numbers fell of before we opened the packaging. Lock looks cheaply made and not Pro quality. Don't buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wood

customer_reviews.title: The package on this lock had obviously been opened before ...
customer_reviews.text: The package on this lock had obviously been opened before it arrived and the lock had been set to someone else's combination so I could not open it to set my combination. I am returning it hoping I can get a new lock.
customer_reviews.author: bobcat

customer_reviews.title: Best lock
customer_reviews.text: This lock is really easy to use and setup. Great item
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Strong, tamper and weather proof
customer_reviews.text: Strong tamper and weather proof. I have purchased several of these to secure outside items.
customer_reviews.author: IMR

customer_reviews.title: Just Junk
customer_reviews.text: They Suck!! Wont lock easy and the rubber cover falls off. have to sent one back. very disappointed in Master Lock
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Feel more protected with this lock!
customer_reviews.text: The product works well. I am scared of the key locks because thieves could pick it if they have the pick tool. The combination lock is harder to break. I feel my property is safer.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Q

customer_reviews.title: however these are terrible. You can not turn the numbered dials
customer_reviews.text: I missed the 30 day return date by 3 days, however these are terrible. You can not turn the numbered dials. Additionally, after you open it you can not close and lock it.... stay away.
customer_reviews.author: T.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure, I did not get a free product. .... If I did I would pay to send it back. Piece of junk lock started seizing 3 weeks after purchase and use. Definitely not what you expect from "pro series" labeled master lock. Don't waste your time with this one. And if your reading master lock, I would like a refund on this purchase
customer_reviews.author: patricia ann kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great lock, small numbers
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this lock on a gate that, at night, is not quite illuminated. It's pretty hard to see the numbers with the lights of my car. Combination does not move if the lock has tension on it. You have to loose it up before being able to set the right combination. Anyway, I start to used a few days ago and it works and looks strong. Let's see how it reacts to nature.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Proto

customer_reviews.title: Saved my possessions!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two of these locks, as the first was so entirely satisfactory. The first one was used on a storage unit where others were broken into, but my lock [and my precious belongings] were left alone. Nice going, MasterLock ProSeries!!
customer_reviews.author: Lupian

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up well outdoors
customer_reviews.text: The lock was installed on a container outside in the tropics. After just 3 months, the rubber covering has fallen off, and the shackle is rusted. The lock still opens, but for how long?
customer_reviews.author: D. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Buy This lock! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I had seen this and said "no more little key to set the combination?". GREAT! I have used one for a while, and now have gotten more of them. Superior to a disc lock(gone thru at least 6). On a storage locker it offers more protection than a disc, and you don't have to worry about remembering the key on the way to storage. p.s. I don't give 5 stars unless I'm floored by an item. So this is my 5 stars for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: combination location is not in a good position. What I am trying to say is ...
customer_reviews.text: The little black pieces are not attached securely, and fall off after a couple of days. combination location is not in a good position. What I am trying to say is that when you go to unlock the lock, the numbers that make up code should be in middle area of bottom, instead it is to the side.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: I needed a good security lock that had a combo since I lost ...
customer_reviews.text: Construction of this thing seems really solid. I needed a good security lock that had a combo since I lost the key to my other storage lock. This was the only one I could find that had the cut guard on it. So far, works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Ian M

customer_reviews.title: one worked good, seems sturdy when locked
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, one worked good, seems sturdy when locked,though it's picky about locking. Combination must be set to lock,or unlock ,shank must be lined up just right too. The second one won't open at all. Of course I didn't need to try it till months after the other, so replacement will probably be a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: A. W. Boykin

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Almost could not remove it. Number dials get jammed/ stuck. Only a month old. Past the return option or I certainly would have.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal R Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to program and I like the water/dirt resistant bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a lock that was cut using bolt cutters. So far, it's kept the thieves at bay. Easy to program and I like the water/dirt resistant bottom cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This lock is junk. Bottom cover fell off immediately. The dials are hard to turn, sometime stuck completely. Now this lock doesn't work at all, the shackle won't lock / engage.
customer_reviews.author: C Jerry Dou

customer_reviews.title: Was a present to my law enforcement brother. He ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a present to my law enforcement brother. He locks is fence gate with it and loves the fact this would be extremely difficult to cut. You can set your own combination also
customer_reviews.author: M Pycraft

customer_reviews.title: Security flaw
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend, Google this item and find videos of this lock being opened easily without combination. Can be easily opened in the dark without any lockpicking experience.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: Not-the-Master Lock
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a solid lock but I should have trusted the other reviews. Not that it mattes much over all but rubber band and rubber cover fell off w/in 48 hrs. Also, it switch combo's on me. It worked for a couple of days then one day my combo didn't work. Luckily, I remembered the one review and the first digit had moved one spot. Also, the dial is not easy to use. It has to be lined up PERFECTLY and if you are using a heavy chain any weight on loop will not allow for number to turn. As I write this I'm lowering from a 2 to a 1.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeTime

customer_reviews.title: Don't, just don't
customer_reviews.text: The rubber flap was constantly falling off and is now lost, the lock does not hold up well outside in the weather and now won't open and close correctly, it's only good for pretending my gate is locked now....
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Smooth operation
customer_reviews.text: Smooth operation. It’s been in the rain for weeks and still as smooth as day one
customer_reviews.author: so-so

customer_reviews.title: Too thick in diameter
customer_reviews.text: Very nice - too thick in diameter for my utility trailer hitch. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney in Mississippi

customer_reviews.title: Strong and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Lock feels very strong and secure. Combination wheels spin easily. Mine only wants to latch when the combination is entered, so if I spin the wheels when I open it, it doesn't want to latch unless I re-enter the combination. Otherwise a great lock.
customer_reviews.author: Devin J. Fitch

customer_reviews.title: Strong Lock
customer_reviews.text: Rubber cover over combination sometimes will come off otherwise works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kent T

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipment and well packed
customer_reviews.text: Nice lock for outdoor use, easy to re-program the lock and change the combination.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: Great lock. A little cumbersome to use but not bad. The numbers can stick a little
customer_reviews.author: Aster G.

customer_reviews.title: Multiple flaws
customer_reviews.text: Hard to open with any tension on it and your can’t change the combo off the numbers when unlocked
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: Solid lock. Very user-friendly. I'd recommend this one to keep things safe. This things so thick, it might be bulletproof.
customer_reviews.author: Bignguyener

customer_reviews.title: Wont buy another
customer_reviews.text: What a junk lock! The shackle fell out like right away. Surprised it`s not made of plastic! And secure? Forget about that, this lock is easily shimed, you can open it with a piece of popcan.
customer_reviews.author: willwag3

customer_reviews.title: I like the combination setting method that doesn't require a key
customer_reviews.text: I like the combination setting method that doesn't require a key. Lock is well made, but the dust cover seems like an afterthought and doesn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nafziger

customer_reviews.title: Our Sesamee lock bought at the same time is doing great.
customer_reviews.text: Used outdoors, stopped opening within two weeks. Our Sesamee lock bought at the same time is doing great.
customer_reviews.author: Ilco

customer_reviews.title: quits working
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, poor quality. I bought four of these locks. After 1 year, three no longer work. They will not open, even when set on the correct combination. Here's a hint: if they won't open, pound a small nail into the hole on the bottom, to the left of the dial. If set on the correct combo, it will knock the shackle open. I have lubricated the locks with different types of lubricant, but it doesn't solve the problem. Somewhat defeats the purpose if you have to carry around a hammer and nail to open the lock!!! Yes, I guess you do get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: D. Ray Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock
customer_reviews.text: This lock is great. I think that this lock is stronger than what I'm using it to lock up to, so I'm actually starting to worry that my lock will get stolen instead of what I'm trying to lock up. Really well made. Really heavy lock, all metal.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great locks but the shackle is just a little too long to fit into the hole on a gym locker.
customer_reviews.author: master key

customer_reviews.title: Look for a better lock.

customer_reviews.title: anyone else working in the same area can easily look at the lock combination
customer_reviews.text: If you leave the lock open you have to leave the combination up, anyone else working in the same area can easily look at the lock combination. In other words you can't open the lock and scramble the combination

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Lock
customer_reviews.text: This lock is very heavy duty. Just make sure if you're using a chain, it is a thinner one as it is hard to fit two large chain links in the loop..

customer_reviews.text: For a secure combination lock, this lock stands up to the challenge. I found Amazon to have the best price for this lock. I sleep comfortably knowing my valuables are secure behind this lock.

customer_reviews.text: Failed when local vandals used it for target practice. Didn't keep my stuff secure. Not sure it's the fault of the lock, it seemed pretty hardy, but does not stand up to a gun.

customer_reviews.text: I'm using ~15 of these and I sleep well knowing my containers are secured with these locks. No issues and love that I can change the combination without a special key.

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would have listened. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible quality. Works great for about a month. We bought 8 of these and 4 are already completely not working after 3 months. The other 4 are hard to open and operate.

product_meta.title: Master Lock, Brass, Padlock, ProSeries Set Your Own Combination Lock, 2-1/4 in. Wide, 1177D
product_meta.description:
Package Quantity:1| Color:BrassThe Master Lock 1177D ProSeries Resettable Combination Padlock is designed for industrial applications and features a 2-1/4in (57mm) wide shrouded solid brass body for superior corrosion resistance and a 1-1/16in (28mm) tall, 3/8in (10mm) diameter octagonal boron-carbide shackle with shrouded feature for ultimate cut resistance. Set your own combination offers convenience and security with 10,000 possible combinations – no reset tool required – and a deadlocking mechanism protects against prying, shimming and rap attacks. The Lifetime Guarantee provides peace of mind from a brand you know and can trust.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Designed for today's security requirements, the new 1177D ProSeries Resettable Combination Locks combine the strength and weatherability needed to withstand harsh treatment and tough environments. Available in brass these locks have new features that improve weatherability: the dial dust cover and the shackle seals keep dust and grit out of the internal mechanisms for trouble-free operation. Stainless steel shackles are also available on some models. These ProSeries locks stand up to physical attacks like no other resettable can. The enhanced octagonal boron-carbide shackles are twice as hard to cut as standard hardened shackles and the dead-locking mechanism holds against pry, shim and rap attacks. The ProSeries Resettable Combination locks combine these security improvements with added user convenience. With 10,000 possible combinations, the large ergonomic dials permit operation with gloves, in low light or complete darkness. These locks are also easily set with no special reset tool required.
feature_bullets: ProSeries resettable combination locks are designed for commercial and industrial applications
Set your own 4 digit combination for convenience and security; 10,000 possible combinations
Large ergonomic dials with exclusive blind feature permit operation with gloves, in low light or complete darkness
Shackle seal and dial dust cover protect internal components and dials for trouble free operation

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
